summary.long: 1 Chronicles is a book of the Old Testament.

verses.text: Adam, Seth, Enosh,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jered,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Japheth: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech, and Tiras.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Gomer: Ashchenaz, Riphath, and Togarmah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Javan: Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Ham: Cush, Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Cush: Seba, Havilah, Sabta, Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah: Sheba and Dedan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Cush begat Nimrod; he began to be mighty upon the earth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mizraim begat Ludim, Anamim, Lehabim, Naphtuhim,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Pathrusim and Casluhim of whom came the Philistines and the Caphthorim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn and the Hitite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the Jebusite, the Amorite, the Girgashite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the Hivite, the Arkite, the Sinite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the Arvadite, the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Shem: Elam, Asshur, Arphaxad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, and Meshech.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And unto Eber were born two sons; the name of the one was Peleg because in his days the earth was divided, and his brotherâ€™s name was Joktan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Joktan begat Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ebal, Abimael, Sheba,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ophir, Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eber, Peleg, Reu,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Serug, Nahor, Terah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Abram, who is Abraham.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Abraham: Isaac and Ishmael.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth, then Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now the sons of Keturah, Abrahamâ€™s concubine: she gave birth to Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak, and Shuah. The sons of Jokshan: Sheba and Dedan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Midian: Ephah, Epher, Enoch, Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac: Esau and Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jaalam, and Korah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Eliphaz: Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna, and Amalek.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Reuel: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Seir: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer, and Dishan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Lotan: Hori and Homam, and Timna was Lotanâ€™s sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Shobal: Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon: Aiah and Anah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Dishon was the son of Anah. The sons of Dishon: Amram, Eshban, Ithran, and Cheran.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Ezer: Bilhan, Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan: Uz and Aran.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the sons of Israel. Bela, the son of Beor, and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Bela was dead, Jobab, the son of Zerah of Bozrah, reigned in his stead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Husham was dead, Hadad, the son of Bedad, who smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead; and the name of his city was Avith.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Samlah was dead, Saul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Saul was dead, Baalhanan, the son of Achbor, reigned in his stead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Baalhanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead. The name of his city was Pai, and his wifeâ€™s name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When Hadad was dead, the dukes came forth in Edom: Duke Timnah, Duke Aliah, Duke Jetheth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Duke Aholibamah, Duke Elah, Duke Pinon,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Duke Kenaz, Duke Teman, Duke Mibzar,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Duke Magdiel, Duke Iram. These were the dukes of Edom.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These are the sons of Israel: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, Zebulun,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Dan, Joseph, Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Judah: Er, Onan, and Shelah. These three were born unto him of the daughter of Shua, the Canaanitess. And Er, the firstborn of Judah, was evil in the sight of the LORD, and he slew him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Tamar, his daughter-in-law, gave birth unto him Pharez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah were five.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Pharez: Hezron and Hamul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Zerah: Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Calcol, and Dara, five of them in all.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Carmi: Achar, the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the anathema.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Azariah was the son of Ethan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons that were born unto Hezron: Jerahmeel, Ram, and Chelubai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ram begat Amminadab, and Amminadab begat Nahshon, prince of the sons of Judah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Jesse,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jesse begat his firstborn Eliab, and Abinadab the second and Shimma the third,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ozem the sixth, David the seventh,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: whose sisters were Zeruiah, and Abigail. The sons of Zeruiah were three: Abishai, Joab, and Asahel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abigail gave birth to Amasa, whose father was Jether the Ishmeelite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Caleb, the son of Hezron, begat Jerioth of Azubah, his wife. And her sons were Jesher, Shobab, and Ardon.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took Ephrath as wife, who gave birth to Hur unto him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir, the father of Gilead, whom he married when he was sixty years old, and she gave birth to Segub unto him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Segub begat Jair, who had twenty-three cities in the land of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Geshur and Aram took the cities of Jair from them, with Kenath and its towns, even sixty cities. All these were of the sons of Machir, the father of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And after Hezron was dead in Calebephratah, then Abiah, Hezronâ€™s wife, gave birth to Ashur unto him, the father of Tekoa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jerahmeel, the firstborn of Hezron, were Ram, the firstborn, Bunah, Oren, Ozem, and Ahijah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jerahmeel had also another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Ram, the firstborn of Jerahmeel, were Maaz, Jamin, and Eker.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Onam were Shammai and Jada. The sons of Shammai, Nadab, and Abishur.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she gave birth to Ahban and Molid unto him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Nadab: Seled and Appaim. But Seled died without children.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ishi was the son of Appaim. And Sheshan, the son of Ishi; and the son of Sheshan, Ahlai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jada, the brother of Shammai: Jether and Jonathan; and Jether died without children.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jonathan: Peleth and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a slave, an Egyptian, whose name was Jarha.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha, his slave, to wife; and she bore him Attai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Eleasah begat Sisamai, and Sisamai begat Shallum,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now the sons of Caleb, the brother of Jerahmeel, were Mesha, his firstborn, who was the father of Ziph, and of his other sons, Mareshah, the father of Hebron.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Hebron: Korah, Tappuah, Rekem, and Shema.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam; and Rekem begat Shammai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Shammai was Maon, and Maon was the father of Bethzur.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ephah, Calebâ€™s concubine, gave birth to Haran, Moza, and Gazez unto him, and Haran begat Gazez.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jahdai: Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Ephah, and Shaaph.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Maachah, Calebâ€™s concubine, gave birth to Sheber and Tirhanah unto him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: She also gave birth to Shaaph, the father of Madmannah, Sheva, the father of Machbenah and father of Gibea. And Achsah was the daughter of Caleb.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the sons of Caleb, the son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah: Shobal, the father of Kirjathjearim,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Salma, the father of Bethlehem, Hareph, the father of Bethgader.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Shobal, the father of Kirjathjearim, who was lord of half of Manaheth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the families of Kirjathjearim: the Ithrites and the Puhites and the Shumathites and the Mishraites; of them came the Zareathites and the Eshtaulites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Salma: Bethlehem and the Netophathites, the crowns of the house of Joab, and half of the Manahethites, the Zorites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the families of the scribes who dwelt at Jabez: the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and Suchathites. These are the Kenites that came of Hemath, the father of the house of Rechab.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron: the firstborn, Amnon of Ahinoam, the Jezreelitess; the second, Daniel of Abigail of Carmel;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the third, Absalom, the son of Maachah, the daughter of Talmai, king of Geshur; the fourth, Adonijah, the son of Haggith;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the fifth, Shephatiah of Abital; the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These six were born unto him in Hebron, and there he reigned seven years and six months, and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty-three years.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these were born unto him in Jerusalem: Shimea, Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon, four of Bathshua, the daughter of Ammiel:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And another nine: Ibhar, Elishama, Eliphelet,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elishama, Eliada, and Eliphelet.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar was their sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Solomonâ€™s son was Rehoboam, Abia, his son; Asa, his son; Jehoshaphat, his son;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joram, his son; Ahaziah, his son; Joash, his son;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Amaziah, his son; Azariah, his son; Jotham, his son;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahaz, his son; Hezekiah, his son; Manasseh, his son;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Amon, his son; Josiah, his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Josiah: the firstborn, Johanan; the second, Jehoiakim; the third, Zedekiah; the fourth, Shallum.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah, his son; Zedekiah his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jeconiah: Assir, Salathiel, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Malchiram also, Pedaiah, Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Pedaiah: Zerubbabel and Shimei. And the sons of Zerubbabel: Meshullam, Hananiah, and Shelomith, their sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Meshullam: Hashubah, Ohel, Berechiah, Hasadiah, and Jushabhesed, five in all.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Hananiah: Pelatiah and Jesaiah, the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Shechaniah: Shemaiah, and the sons of Shemaiah: Hattush, Igeal, Bariah, Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Neariah: Elioenai, Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Elioenai: Hodaiah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Judah: Pharez, Hezron, Carmi, Hur, and Shobal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Reaiah, the son of Shobal, begat Jahath, and Jahath begat Ahumai and Lahad. These are the families of the Zorathites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these were of the father of Etam: Jezreel, Ishma, and Idbash, and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Penuel, the father of Gedor, and Ezer, the father of Hushah. These were the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah, the father of Bethlehem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ashur, the father of Tekoa, had two wives, Helah and Naarah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Naarah gave birth to Ahuzam, Hepher, Temeni, and Haahashtari unto him. These were the sons of Naarah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Helah: Zereth, Jezoar, and Ethnan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Coz begat Anub and Zobebah and the family of Aharhel, the son of Harum.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jabez was more honoured than his brethren, and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, Because I gave birth to him with sorrow.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou would bless me indeed and enlarge my border and that thy hand might be with me and that thou would deliver me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Chelub, the brother of Shuah, begat Mehir, who was the father of Eshton.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Eshton begat Bethrapha, Paseah, and Tehinnah, the father of Irnahash. These are the men of Rechah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Kenaz: Othniel and Seraiah. The sons of Othniel: Hathath
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Meonothai, who begat Ophrah. And Seraiah begat Joab, the father of the inhabitants of the valley of Charashim, for they were craftsmen.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Caleb, the son of Jephunneh: Iru, Elah, and Naam; and Kenaz was the son of Elah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Jehaleleel: Ziph, Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Ezra: Jether, Mered, Epher, and Jalon; and also begat Miriam, Shammai, and Ishbah, the father of Eshtemoa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his wife Jehudijah gave birth unto him Jered, the father of Gedor, and Heber, the father of Socho, and Jekuthiel, the father of Zanoah. And these are the sons of Bithiah, the daughter of Pharaoh, which Mered took.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of the wife of Hodiah, the sister of Naham, were the father of Keilah, the Garmite, and Eshtemoa, the Maachathite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Shimon: Amnon, Rinnah, Benhanan, and Tilon. And the sons of Ishi: Zoheth and Benzoheth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Shelah, the son of Judah: Er, the father of Lecah, and Laadah, the father of Mareshah, and the families of the house of those that wrought fine linen, of the house of Ashbea,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jokim and the men of Chozeba, and Joash and Saraph, who had the dominion in Moab, and Jashubilehem. And these are ancient words.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the potters and those that dwelt among plants and hedges, who dwelt there with the king for his work.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Simeon: Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, Saul;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: also Shallum, his son, Mibsam, his son, and Mishma, his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Mishma: Hamuel, his son, Zacchur, his son, Shimei his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters, but his brethren did not have many children, neither did all their family multiply, like the sons of Judah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they dwelt at Beersheba and Moladah and Hazarshual
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and at Bilhah and at Ezem and at Tolad
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and at Bethuel and at Hormah and at Ziklag
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and at Bethmarcaboth and Hazarsusim and at Bethbirei and at Shaaraim. These were their cities until the reign of David.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their villages were Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Tochen, and Ashan, five cities;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and all their villages that were round about the same cities, unto Baal. These were their habitations and their genealogy.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Meshobab and Jamlech and Joshah, the son of Amaziah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Joel and Jehu, the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Elioenai, Jaakobah, Jeshohaiah, Asaiah, Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ziza, the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These mentioned by their names were princes in their families, and they were multiplied greatly in the house of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they came unto the entrance of Gedor, even unto the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they found fat pasture and good, and the land was wide and spacious and quiet and peaceable, for the sons of Ham had dwelt there of old.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these written by name came in the days of Hezekiah, king of Judah and smote their tents and the habitations that were found there and destroyed them utterly unto this day and dwelt in their place because there was pasture there for their flocks.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And likewise five hundred men of them, of the sons of Simeon, went to Mount Seir, having for their captains Pelatiah and Neariah and Rephaiah and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they smote the rest of the Amalekites that were escaped and dwelt there unto this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now the sons of Reuben, the firstborn of Israel, (for he was the firstborn, but because he defiled his fatherâ€™s bed, his birthright was given unto the sons of Joseph, the son of Israel; and he was not counted as the firstborn.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For Judah prevailed above his brethren and was their prince, but the birthright was Josephâ€™s:)
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons, therefore, of Reuben, the firstborn of Israel, were Enoch, Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Joel: Shemaiah, his son, Gog, his son, Shimei, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Micah, his son, Reaia, his son, Baal, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beerah, his son, whom Tilgathpilneser, king of Assyria, carried away captive. He was prince of the Reubenites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his brethren by their families, when the genealogy of their generations was reckoned, had as princes, Jeiel and Zechariah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Bela, the son of Azaz, the son of Shema, the son of Joel, dwelt in Aroer, even until Nebo and Baalmeon.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And eastward he inhabited unto the entering in of the wilderness from the river Euphrates, because their livestock were multiplied in the land of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in the days of Saul they made war with the Hagarites, {Ishmaelites} who fell by their hand, and they dwelt in their tents throughout all the east land of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Gad dwelt over against them, in the land of Bashan unto Salchah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joel, the chief, and Shapham, second, and Jaanai and Shaphat in Bashan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren of the house of their fathers were Michael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Jachan, Zia, and Heber, seven.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the sons of Abihail, the son of Huri, the son of Jaroah, the son of Gilead, the son of Michael, the son of Jeshishai, the son of Jahdo, the son of Buz.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Also Ahi, the son of Abdiel, the son of Guni, was the prince of the house of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they dwelt in Gilead in Bashan and in her towns and in all the suburbs of Sharon, upon their goings forth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these were reckoned by their generations in the days of Jotham, king of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam, king of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Reuben and of Gad and half the tribe of Manasseh, valiant men, men able to bear buckler and sword and to shoot with bow and skillful in war were forty-four thousand seven hundred and sixty, that went out to the war.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they made war with the Hagarites, with Jetur and Nephish and Nodab.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they were helped against them, and the Hagarites were delivered into their hand and all that were with them, for they cried to God in the battle, and he was intreated of them because they put their trust in him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they took away their livestock; fifty thousand camels and two hundred and fifty thousand sheep and two thousand asses and one hundred thousand persons.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For there fell down many slain because the war was of God. And they dwelt in their steads until the captivity.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of the half tribe of Manasseh dwelt in the land; they increased from Bashan unto Baalhermon and Senir and unto Mount Hermon.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these were the heads of the houses of their fathers: Epher, Ishi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremiah, Hodaviah, and Jahdiel, mighty men of valour, famous men, and heads of the houses of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But they rebelled against the God of their fathers and fornicated after the gods of the people of the land, whom God had destroyed before them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And for this the God of Israel stirred up the spirit of Pul, king of Assyria, and the spirit of Tilgathpilneser, king of Assyria, and he carried away the Reubenites and the Gadites and the half tribe of Manasseh and brought them unto Halah and Habor and Hara and to the River Gozan, unto this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Amram: Aaron, Moses, and Miriam. The sons of Aaron: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eleazar begat Phinehas, and Phinehas begat Abishua,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Abishua begat Bukki, and Bukki begat Uzzi,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Uzzi begat Zerahiah, and Zerahiah begat Meraioth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Meraioth begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Ahimaaz,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ahimaaz begat Azariah, and Azariah begat Johanan,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Johanan begat Azariah, who had the priesthood in the house that Solomon built in Jerusalem,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Azariah begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Shallum,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Shallum begat Hilkiah, and Hilkiah begat Azariah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Azariah begat Seraiah, and Seraiah begat Jehozadak,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jehozadak went into captivity, when the LORD carried away Judah and Jerusalem by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are the names of the sons of Gershon: Libni and Shimei.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Merari: Mahli, Mushi. These are the families of the Levites according to their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of Gershon: Libni, his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joah, his son, Iddo, his son, Zerah, his son, Jeaterai, his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Kohath: Amminadab, his son, Korah, his son, Assir, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elkanah, his son, and Ebiasaph, his son, and Assir, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Tahath, his son, Uriel, his son, Uzziah, his son, and Saul, his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Elkanah: Amasai, Ahimoth, and Elkanah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Elkanah: Zophai, his son, and Nahath, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eliab, his son, Jeroham, his son, Elkanah, his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Samuel: the firstborn Vashni and Abiah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Merari: Mahli, Libni, his son, Shimei, his son, Uzza, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shimea, his son, Haggiah, his son, Asaiah, his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are they whom David set over the service of song in the house of the LORD, after the ark had rest.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they served before the tent of the tabernacle of the testimony with singing until Solomon had built the house of the LORD in Jerusalem, and then they remained in their ministry according to their right.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are those that remained with their sons. Of the sons of the Kohath: Heman, a singer, the son of Joel, the son of Shemuel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the son of Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Eliel, the son of Toah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the son of Zuph, the son of Elkanah, the son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the son of Tahath, the son of Assir, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, the son of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his brother Asaph, who stood on his right hand, even Asaph the son of Berachiah, the son of Shimea,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the son of Michael, the son of Baaseiah, the son of Malchiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the son of Ethni, the son of Zerah, the son of Adaiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the son of Shimei,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the son of Jahath, the son of Gershon, the son of Levi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren, the sons of Merari, stood on the left hand; Ethan, the son of Kishi, the son of Abdi, the son of Malluch,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the son of Hashabiah, the son of Amaziah, the son of Hilkiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the son of Amzi, the son of Bani, the son of Shamer,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the son of Mahli, the son of Mushi, the son of Merari, the son of Levi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Their brethren, also the Levites, were given over unto all the ministry of the tabernacle of the house of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But Aaron and his sons made incense upon the altar of the burnt offering and on the altar of incense, in all the work of the holy of holies, and to make reconciliation for Israel, according to all that Moses, the slave of God, had commanded.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are the sons of Aaron: Eleazar, his son, Phinehas, his son, Abishua, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Bukki, his son, Uzzi, his son, Zerahiah, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Meraioth, his son, Amariah, his son, Ahitub, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zadok, his son, Ahimaaz, his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these are their dwelling places throughout their palaces in their borders, of the sons of Aaron, of the families of the Kohathites; for theirs was the lot,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: that they gave them Hebron in the land of Judah and its suburbs round about it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But the fields around the city and its villages, they gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And to the sons of Aaron they gave the cities of refuge of Judah, namely, Hebron and Libnah with their suburbs, and Jattir and Eshtemoa, with their suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Hilen with her suburbs, Debir with her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ashan with her suburbs, and Bethshemesh with her suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the tribe of Benjamin; Geba with her suburbs and Alemeth with her suburbs and Anathoth with her suburbs. All their cities throughout their families were thirteen cities.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And unto the sons of Kohath, who were left of that family, they gave ten cities of the half tribe of Manasseh, by lot.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And to the sons of Gershon, throughout their families, out of the tribe of Issachar and out of the tribe of Asher and out of the tribe of Naphtali and out of the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Unto the sons of Merari were given by lot, throughout their families, out of the tribe of Reuben and out of the tribe of Gad and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Israel gave to the Levites these cities with their suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they gave by lot out of the tribe of the sons of Judah and out of the tribe of the sons of Simeon and out of the tribe of the sons of Benjamin, these cities, which are called by their names.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the residue of the families of the sons of Kohath had cities with their borders out of the tribe of Ephraim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they gave unto them, of the cities of refuge, Shechem in Mount Ephraim with her suburbs; they gave also Gezer with her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jokmeam with her suburbs and Bethhoron with her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Aijalon with her suburbs and Gathrimmon with her suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the half tribe of Manasseh; Aner with her suburbs and Bileam with her suburbs, for the family of the remnant of the sons of Kohath.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Unto the sons of Gershon were given out of the family of the half tribe of Manasseh, Golan in Bashan with her suburbs and Ashtaroth with her suburbs;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and out of the tribe of Issachar; Kedesh with her suburbs, Daberath with her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ramoth with her suburbs, and Anem with her suburbs;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and out of the tribe of Asher, Mashal with her suburbs and Abdon with her suburbs
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Hukok with her suburbs and Rehob with her suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the tribe of Naphtali; Kedesh in Galilee with her suburbs and Hammon with her suburbs and Kirjathaim with her suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Unto the rest of the sons of Merari were given out of the tribe of Zebulun, Rimmon with her suburbs, Tabor with her suburbs;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and on the other side of the Jordan by Jericho, on the east side of the Jordan, were given them out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the wilderness with her suburbs and Jahzah with her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Kedemoth also with her suburbs and Mephaath with her suburbs;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and out of the tribe of Gad; Ramoth in Gilead with her suburbs and Mahanaim with her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Heshbon with her suburbs and Jazer with her suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Issachar: Tola, Puah, Jashub, and Shimron, four.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Tola: Uzzi, Rephaiah, Jeriel, Jahmai, Jibsam, and Shemuel, heads of the houses of their fathers. Those of Tola numbered by their families twenty-two thousand valiant men of might in the days of David.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Uzzi was Izrahiah; and the sons of Izrahiah: Michael, Obadiah, Joel, Ishiah, all of them, five princes.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And with them, by their lineages, after the houses of their fathers, were bands of soldiers for war, thirty-six thousand men, for they had many wives and sons.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren among all the families of Issachar were valiant men of might, reckoned in all by their genealogies eighty-seven thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Benjamin: Bela, Becher, and Jediael, three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Bela: Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth, and Iri, five, heads of the houses of their fathers, mighty men of valour; and were reckoned by their genealogies twenty-two thousand and thirty-four.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Becher: Zemira, Joash, Eliezer, Elioenai, Omri, Jerimoth, Abiah, Anathoth, and Alameth. All these are the sons of Becher.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the number of them, after their genealogy by their generations, heads of the houses of their fathers, mighty men of valour, was twenty thousand two hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Jediael was Bilhan; and the sons of Bilhan: Jeush, Benjamin, Ehud, Chenaanah, Zethan, Tarshish, and Ahishahar.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these were sons of Jediael, by the heads of their fathers, mighty men of valour, seventeen thousand two hundred soldiers, fit to go out for war and battle.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shuppim and Huppim were sons of Ir; and Hushim, the son of Aher.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Naphtali: Jahziel, Guni, Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Manasseh: Ashriel, whom his concubine, the Aramitess, gave birth unto him; she also gave birth to Machir, the father of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Machir took wives of Huppim and Shuppim, whose sisterâ€™s name was Maachah, and the name of the second was Zelophehad. And Zelophehad had daughters.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Maachah, the wife of Machir, gave birth to a son unto him, and she called his name Peresh, and the name of his brother was Sheresh, whose sons were Ulam and Rakem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Ulam was Bedan. These were the sons of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his sister Hammoleketh gave birth to Ishod, Abiezer, and Mahalah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Shemida were, Ahian, Shechem, Likhi, and Aniam.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Ephraim: Shuthelah, Bered, his son, Tahath his son, Eladah, his son, Tahath, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zabad, his son, Shuthelah, his son, Ezer, and Elead, whom the men of Gath that were born in that land slew because they came down to take away their livestock.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ephraim, their father, mourned many days, and his brethren came to comfort him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when he went in to his wife, she conceived and gave birth to a son, and he called his name Beriah, because he had been in affliction in his house.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: (And his daughter was Sherah, who built Bethhoron, the lower and the upper, and Uzzensherah.)
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Rephah was his son, also Resheph, and Telah his son, and Tahan, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Laadan, his son, Ammihud, his son, Elishama, his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nun, his son, Joshua, his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their inheritance and habitation was Bethel with its towns, and eastward Naaran, and westward Gezer with its towns; likewise Shechem and its towns unto Gaza and its towns,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and by the side of the sons of Manasseh, Bethshean and her towns, Taanach and her towns, Megiddo and her towns, Dor and her towns. In these dwelt the sons of Joseph, the son of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Asher: Imnah, Isuah, Ishuai, Beriah, and Serah, their sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Beriah: Heber and Malchiel, who was the father of Birzavith.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Heber begat Japhlet, Shomer, Hotham, and Shua their sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Japhlet: Pasach, Bimhal, and Ashvath. These were the sons of Japhlet.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Shamer: Ahi, Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of his brother Helem: Zophah, Imna, Shelesh, and Amal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Zophah: Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah, Ithran, and Beera.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Jether: Jephunneh, Pispah, and Ara.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Ulla: Arah, Haniel, and Rezia.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these were sons of Asher, heads of their fatherâ€™s houses, chosen, mighty men of valour, heads of princes. And the number throughout the genealogy of those that were apt for war and for battle was twenty-six thousand men.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now Benjamin begat Bela, his firstborn, Ashbel, the second, and Aharah, the third,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nohah, the fourth, and Rapha, the fifth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Bela were Addar, Gera, Abihud,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Gera, Shephuphan, and Hiram.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers who inhabited Geba, and they were removed to Manahath,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: That is, Naaman, Ahiah, and Gera; he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shaharaim begat sons in the fields of Moab after he had sent away Hushim and Baara, his wives.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he begat of Hodesh, his wife, Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcham,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jeuz, Shachia, and Mirma. These are his sons, heads of the fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Hushim he begat Abitub and Elpaal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Elpaal: Eber, Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beriah also and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zebadiah, Arad, Ader,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Michael, Ispah, and Joha, sons of Beriah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hezeki, Heber;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ishmerai, Jezliah, and Jobab, sons of Elpaal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jakim, Zichri, Zabdi,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elienai, Zilthai, Eliel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Adaiah, Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ishpan, Heber, Eliel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Abdon, Zichri, Hanan,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hananiah, Elam, Antothijah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Iphedeiah, and Penuel, sons of Shashak,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Jaresiah, Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men who dwelt in Jerusalem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wifeâ€™s name was Maachah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and his firstborn son, Abdon, then Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Gedor, Ahio, and Zacher.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, next to them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Jonathan was Meribbaal; and Meribbaal begat Micah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Micah: Pithon, Melech, Tarea, and Ahaz.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth and Azmaveth and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Moza begat Binea; Rapha was his son, Eleasah, his son, Azel, his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these: Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Eshek, his brother: Ulam, his firstborn, Jehush, the second, and Eliphelet, the third.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, expert archers who had many sons, and sonsâ€™ sons, one hundred and fifty. All these were of the sons of Benjamin.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So all Israel were reckoned by genealogies, and behold, they were written in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah, who were carried away to Babylon for their rebellion.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now the first inhabitants that dwelt in their possessions in their cities were thus of Israel, as of the priests, Levites, and the Nethinims.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in Jerusalem dwelt of the sons of Judah and of the sons of Benjamin and of the sons of Ephraim and Manasseh:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uthai, the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the sons of Pharez, the son of Judah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Shiloni: Asaiah the firstborn and his sons.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the sons of Zerah: Jeuel and their brethren, six hundred and ninety.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the sons of Benjamin: Sallu, the son of Meshullam, the son of Hodaviah, the son of Hasenuah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ibneiah the son of Jeroham; and Elah, the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri; and Meshullam, the son of Shephathiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and their brethren, according to their generations, nine hundred and fifty-six. All these men were heads of the fathers in the houses of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the priests: Jedaiah, Jehoiarib, and Jachin;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Azariah, the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, prince of the house of God;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Adaiah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchijah; and Maasiai, the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and their brethren, heads of the houses of their fathers, one thousand seven hundred and sixty, mighty men of valour for the work of the ministry of the house of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the Levites: Shemaiah, the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Bakbakkar, Heresh, and Galal, and Mattaniah, the son of Micah, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Obadiah, the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun; and Berechiah, the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, who dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the porters: Shallum, Akkub, Talmon, Ahiman, and their brethren; Shallum was the head.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And until now in the companies of the sons of Levi these have been the porters in the kingâ€™s gate towards the east.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shallum, the son of Kore, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah, and his brethren of the house of his father, the Korahites, were over the work of the ministry, keepers of the gates of the tabernacle; and their fathers, being over the camp of the LORD, were keepers of the entry.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Phinehas, the son of Eleazar, was the captain over them in time past, and the LORD was with him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Zechariah, the son of Meshelemiah, was porter of the door of the tabernacle of the testimony.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these which were chosen to be porters in the gates were two hundred and twelve when they were reckoned by their genealogy in their villages, whom David and Samuel, the seer, ordained in their set office.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So they and their sons had the oversight of the gates of the house of the LORD, namely, the house of the tabernacle, by wards.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Towards the four winds were the porters, toward the east, west, north, and Negev.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren, who were in their villages, came every seven days in their set times with them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For these Levites, the four chief porters, were in their set office and were over the chambers and treasures of the house of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they lodged round about the house of God, because the charge was upon them, and the opening thereof every morning pertained to them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And certain of them had the charge of the vessels of ministry, that they should account for them when they were brought in and out.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Some of them also were appointed to oversee the vessels and all the instruments of the sanctuary and the fine flour and the wine and the oil and the frankincense and the spices.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And some of the sons of the priests made the ointment of the spices.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mattithiah, one of the Levites, who was the firstborn of Shallum, the Korahite, had the set office over the things that were made in the pans.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And other of their brethren, of the sons of the Kohathites, were over the showbread, to order it every sabbath.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of these there were singers, princes of the fathers of the Levites, who remained in the chambers free from other work; for they were employed in that work day and night.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These heads of the fathers of the Levites were heads throughout their generations; these dwelt at Jerusalem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon, Jehiel, whose wifeâ€™s name was Maachah;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and his firstborn son Abdon, then Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Gedor, Ahio, Zechariah, and Mikloth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mikloth begat Shimeam. And they also dwelt with their brethren at Jerusalem, next to their brethren.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Jonathan was Meribbaal, and Meribbaal begat Micah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Micah: Pithon, Melech, Tahrea, and Ahaz.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ahaz begat Jarah, and Jarah begat Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Moza begat Binea; and Rephaiah his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these: Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan: these were the sons of Azel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now the Philistines fought against Israel; and the men of Israel fled from before the Philistines and fell down slain in Mount Gilboa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Philistines followed hard after Saul and after his sons; and the Philistines slew Jonathan, Abinadab, and Malchishua, the sons of Saul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the battle went sore against Saul, and the archers hit him, and he was wounded of the archers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then said Saul to his armourbearer, Draw thy sword and thrust me through with it lest these uncircumcised come and abuse me. But his armourbearer would not, for he was sore afraid. Then Saul took a sword and fell upon it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when his armourbearer saw that Saul was dead, he fell likewise on his sword and died.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So Saul died and his three sons and all his house died together.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when all the men of Israel that were in the valley saw that, they fled, and that Saul and his sons were dead, then they forsook their cities and fled, and the Philistines came and dwelt in them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And it came to pass on the next day, when the Philistines came to strip the slain, that they found Saul and his sons fallen in Mount Gilboa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when they had stripped him, they took his head and his weapons and sent into the land of the Philistines round about, to carry tidings unto their idols and to the people.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they put his weapons in the house of their gods and fastened his head in the temple of Dagon.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when all Jabeshgilead heard all that the Philistines had done to Saul,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: all the valiant men arose and took away the body of Saul and the bodies of his sons and brought them to Jabesh and buried their bones under the oak in Jabesh and fasted seven days.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So Saul died for his rebellion which he committed against the LORD, even against the word of the LORD, which he did not keep, and also for consulting a spiritist, to enquire of her
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and not enquire of the LORD; therefore, he slew him and turned the kingdom unto David, the son of Jesse.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then all Israel gathered themselves to David in Hebron, saying, Behold, we are thy bone and thy flesh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And moreover yesterday and the day before yesterday, when Saul was king, it was thou that led out and brought in Israel; and the LORD thy God hath said unto thee, Thou shalt feed my people Israel, and thou shalt be ruler over my people Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Therefore, all the elders of Israel came to the king in Hebron, and David made a covenant with them in Hebron before the LORD, and they anointed David king over Israel, according to the word of the LORD by the hand of Samuel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then David and all Israel went to Jerusalem, which is Jebus, for there the Jebusites were, the inhabitants of that land.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the inhabitants of Jebus said to David, Thou shalt not enter here. Nevertheless, David took the fortress of Zion, which is the city of David.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David said, Whoever smites the Jebusites first shall be head and prince. So Joab, the son of Zeruiah, went up first and was made the head.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David dwelt in the fortress; therefore, they called it the city of David.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he built the city round about, even from Millo round about, and Joab restored the rest of the city.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So David waxed greater and greater, for the LORD of the hosts was with him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These also are the chief of the mighty men whom David had, who strengthened him in his kingdom, with all Israel, to make him king over Israel, according to the word of the LORD.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And this is the number of the mighty men whom David had: Jashobeam, of Hachmoni, the chief of the captains; he lifted up his spear against three hundred slain at one time and killed them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And after him was Eleazar, the son of Dodo, the Ahohite, who was one of the three mighties.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He was with David at Pasdammim, and there the Philistines were gathered together to battle, where there was an inheritance of land full of barley; and as the people fled from before the Philistines,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: they set themselves in the midst of that portion and delivered it and slew the Philistines; and the LORD saved them by a great salvation.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now three of the thirty principal ones went down to the rock to David, into the cave of Adullam; and the camp of the Philistines was pitched in the valley of Rephaim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David was then in the fortress, and the Philistinesâ€™ garrison was then at Bethlehem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David longed and said, Oh, that one would give me drink of the water of the well of Bethlehem, that is at the gate!
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And those three broke through the camp of the Philistines and drew water out of the well of Bethlehem, that was by the gate and took it and brought it to David; but David would not drink of it, but poured it out to the LORD,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and said, May God keep me from doing this thing. Shall I drink the blood of these men that have put their lives in jeopardy? For with the jeopardy of their lives they brought it. Therefore, he would not drink it. These things did these three mightiest.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abishai, the brother of Joab, was chief of three, who had lifted up his spear against three hundred, whom he slew and had a name among the three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the three, he obtained the most honour in this second group of three, for he was their prince; however, he did not attain to the first three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Benaiah, the son of Jehoiada, the son of a valiant man, of great acts, of Kabzeel; he slew two lions of Moab; he also went down and slew a lion in the middle of a pit on a snowy day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he slew an Egyptian, a man of great stature, five cubits high; and in the Egyptianâ€™s hand was a spear like a weaverâ€™s beam; and he went down to him with a staff and plucked the spear out of the Egyptianâ€™s hand and slew him with his own spear.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These things did Benaiah, the son of Jehoiada, and had the name among the three mighties.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He was the most honoured among the thirty, but did not attain to the first three. And David placed him in his council.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Also the valiant men of the armies were Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan, the son of Dodo of Bethlehem,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shammoth of Harori, Helez, the Pelonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ira, the son of Ikkesh, the Tekoite, Abiezer, the Antothite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sibbecai, the Hushathite, Ilai, the Ahohite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Maharai, the Netophathite, Heled, the son of Baanah, the Netophathite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ithai, the son of Ribai of Gibeah, that pertained to the sons of Benjamin, Benaiah, the Pirathonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hurai of the Gaash river, Abiel, the Arbathite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Azmaveth, the Baharumite, Eliahba, the Shaalbonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: the sons of Hashem, the Gizonite, Jonathan, the son of Shage, the Hararite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahiam, the son of Sacar, the Hararite, Eliphal, the son of Ur,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hepher, the Mecherathite, Ahijah, the Pelonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hezro, the Carmelite, Naarai, the son of Ezbai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joel, the brother of Nathan, Mibhar, the son of Haggeri,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zelek, the Ammonite, Naharai, the Berothite, the armourbearer of Joab, the son of Zeruiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ira, the Ithrite, Gareb, the Ithrite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uriah, the Hittite, Zabad, the son of Ahlai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Adina, the son of Shiza, the Reubenite, head of the Reubenites, and thirty with him,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hanan, the son of Maachah, and Joshaphat, the Mithnite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uzzia, the Ashterathite, Shama and Jehiel, the sons of Hothan, the Aroerite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jediael, the son of Shimri, and Joha, his brother, the Tizite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eliel, the Mahavite, and Jeribai, and Joshaviah, the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah, the Moabite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eliel, and Obed, and Jasiel the Mesobaite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these are those that came to David to Ziklag, while he was yet restrained because of Saul, the son of Kish; and they were among the mighty men, helpers of the war.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: They were armed with bows and could use both the right hand and the left in hurling stones and shooting arrows out of a bow, even of Saulâ€™s brethren of Benjamin.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The chief was Ahiezer, then Joash, the sons of Shemaah, the Gibeathite; and Jeziel and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth; and Berachah and Jehu, the Antothite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Ismaiah, the Gibeonite, a mighty man among the thirty, and more than the thirty; and Jeremiah, Jahaziel, Johanan, Josabad, the Gederathite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eluzai, Jerimoth, Bealiah, Shemariah, Shephatiah, the Haruphite;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elkanah, Jesiah, Azareel, Joezer, Jashobeam, the Korhites,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Joelah and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the Gadites there separated themselves unto David in the fortress in the wilderness, men of might of war fit for the battle, put in order with shield and buckler, whose faces were like the faces of lions and were as swift as the roes upon the mountains;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ezer, the chief, Obadiah, the second, Eliab, the third,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Mishmannah, the fourth, Jeremiah, the fifth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Attai, the sixth, Eliel, the seventh,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Johanan, the eighth, Elzabad, the ninth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jeremiah, the tenth, Machbanai, the eleventh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were of the sons of Gad, captains of the host. One of the least was over one hundred men, and the greatest over a thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These went over the Jordan in the first month, when it had overflown all its banks, and they put to flight all those of the valleys to the east and to the west.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Likewise, some of the sons of Benjamin and Judah came to David, to the fortress.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David went out to meet them and answered and said unto them, If you are come peaceably unto me to help me, my heart shall be knit unto you; but if you are come to betray me to my enemies, seeing there is no violence in my hands, let the God of our fathers look thereon and rebuke it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then the spirit clothed himself in Amasai, who was chief of the thirty, and he said, For thee, O David, and with thee, thou son of Jesse. Peace, peace be unto thee, and peace be to thy helpers; for thy God helps thee. Then David received them and put them among the captains of the band.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And some of Manasseh passed over to David, when he came with the Philistines against Saul to battle, although they did not help them, for the cardinals of the Philistines, upon counsel, sent him away, saying, He will pass over to his master Saul with our heads.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: As he went to Ziklag, there passed over to him of Manasseh, Adnah, Jozabad, Jediael, Michael, Jozabad, Elihu, and Zilthai, heads of the thousands that were of Manasseh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they helped David with a band; for they were all mighty men of valour and were captains in the host.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For at that time help came every day to David until it was a great camp, like the camp of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And this is the number of the heads of those that were ready armed for war and came to David in Hebron, to turn the kingdom of Saul to him, according to the word of the LORD.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Judah that bore shield and spear, six thousand eight hundred, ready armed for war.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Simeon, mighty men of valour for the war, seven thousand one hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Levi four thousand six hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Likewise Jehoiada, prince of those of the lineage of Aaron, and with him three thousand seven hundred;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Zadok, a young man mighty of valour, and of his fatherâ€™s house twenty-two captains.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Benjamin, the kindred of Saul, three thousand; for in that time many of them had the charge of the house of Saul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the sons of Ephraim twenty thousand eight hundred, mighty men of valour, famous throughout the houses of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the half tribe of Manasseh eighteen thousand, who were designated by name, to come and make David king.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the sons of Issachar, two hundred chief men, who had understanding of the times and were wise to know what Israel ought to do; and all their brethren followed their word.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of Zebulun, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, with all weapons of war, fifty thousand, who could keep rank; they were not of double heart.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Naphtali a thousand captains and with them with shield and spear thirty-seven thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of those of Dan expert in war twenty-eight thousand six hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Asher, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, forty thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the other side of the Jordan, of those of Reuben and those of Gad and of the half tribe of Manasseh, with all manner of instruments of war for the battle, one hundred and twenty thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these men of war, that could keep rank, came with a perfect heart to Hebron, to make David king over all Israel; and likewise, all the rest also of Israel were of one heart to make David king.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And there they were with David three days, eating and drinking, for their brethren had prepared for them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And likewise, those that were near them, even unto Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali, brought bread on asses and on camels and on mules and on oxen, and food, meal, cakes of figs, and bunches of raisins, and wine and oil, and oxen, and sheep abundantly; for there was joy in Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David consulted with the captains of thousands and hundreds and with all the princes.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David said unto all the congregation of Israel, If it seems good unto you and unto the LORD our God, let us send everywhere to call our brethren who have remained in all the lands of Israel and with them also the priests and Levites who are in their cities and suburbs, that they may gather themselves unto us;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and let us bring again the ark of our God to us, for from the time of Saul we have not paid attention to it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And all the congregation said to do so, for the thing seemed right in the eyes of all the people.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So David gathered all Israel together, from Shihor of Egypt even unto the entering of Hemath, to bring the ark of God from Kirjathjearim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David went up with all Israel to Baalah, that is, to Kirjathjearim, which is in Judah, to bring up from there the ark of God the LORD, who dwells between the cherubim, whose name is called on it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they carried the ark of God in a new cart out of the house of Abinadab, and Uzza and his brother drove the cart.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David and all Israel played before God with all their might, with songs and with harps and with psalteries and with timbrels and with cymbals and with trumpets.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when they came unto the threshingfloor of Chidon, Uzza put forth his hand to hold the ark, for the oxen stumbled.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the anger of the LORD was kindled against Uzza, and he smote him because he had put his hand to the ark, and there he died before God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David was displeased because the LORD had made a breach upon Uzza; therefore, that place is called Perezuzza to this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David was afraid of God that day, saying, How shall I bring the ark of God home to me?
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So David did not bring the ark home to himself to the city of David but carried it into the house of Obededom, the Gittite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the ark of God remained with the household of Obededom in his house three months. And the LORD blessed the household of Obededom and all that he had.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now Hiram, king of Tyre, sent messengers to David, and timber of cedars, with masons and carpenters, to build him a house.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David, understanding that the LORD had confirmed him king over Israel and had lifted up his kingdom above his people Israel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: took more wives at Jerusalem; and David begat more sons and daughters.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now these are the names of his children which were born unto him in Jerusalem: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ibhar, Elishua, Elpalet,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elishama, Beeliada, and Eliphalet.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when the Philistines heard that David was anointed king over all Israel, all the Philistines went up to seek David. And David heard of it and went out against them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Philistines came and spread themselves in the valley of Rephaim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David enquired of God, saying, Shall I go up against the Philistines? Wilt thou deliver them into my hand? And the LORD said unto him, Go up, for I will deliver them into thy hands.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So they came up to Baalperazim, and David smote them there. Then David said, God has broken in upon my enemies by my hand like the breaking forth of waters. Therefore, they called the name of that place Baalperazim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they left their gods there, and David gave a commandment, and they were burned with fire.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Philistines yet again spread themselves abroad in the valley.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Therefore, David enquired again of God; and God said unto him, Do not go up after them; go around them to come upon them over against the mulberry trees;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and it shall be, when thou shalt hear a sound of marching in the tops of the mulberry trees, that then thou shalt go out to battle; for God shall go forth before thee to smite the host of the Philistines.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: David, therefore, did as God commanded him, and they smote the host of the Philistines from Gibeon even to Gazer.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the fame of David went out into all those lands, and the LORD put the fear of him upon all the Gentiles.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David made houses for himself in the city of David and prepared a place for the ark of God and pitched a tent for it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then David said, The ark of God should not be brought except by the Levites, for the LORD has chosen them to carry the ark of God and to minister unto him perpetually.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David gathered all Israel together in Jerusalem to bring up the ark of the LORD unto its place, which he had prepared for it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David assembled the sons of Aaron and the Levites:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: of the sons of Kohath: Uriel, the chief, and his brethren, one hundred and twenty;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: of the sons of Merari: Asaiah, the chief and his brethren, two hundred and twenty;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: of the sons of Gershon: Joel, the chief, and his brethren one hundred and thirty;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: of the sons of Elizaphan: Shemaiah, the chief, and his brethren, two hundred;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: of the sons of Hebron: Eliel, the chief and his brethren, eighty;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: of the sons of Uzziel: Amminadab, the chief, and his brethren, one hundred and twelve.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David also called for Zadok and Abiathar, the priests, and for the Levites, for Uriel, Asaiah, Joel, Shemaiah, Eliel, and Amminadab
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and said unto them, Ye are the chief of the fathers among the Levites; sanctify yourselves and your brethren and bring up the ark of the LORD God of Israel unto the place that I have prepared for it,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: for because ye did not do it thus at the first, the LORD our God made a breach upon us because we did not seek him according to his ordinance.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the ark of the LORD God of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of the Levites bore the ark of God upon their shoulders with the staves, as Moses had commanded according to the word of the LORD.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David spoke to the chief of the Levites to appoint of their brethren as singers with instruments of music, with psalteries and harps and cymbals sounding, and to lift up their voice with joy.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So the Levites appointed Heman, the son of Joel; and of his brethren, Asaph, the son of Berechiah; and of the sons of Merari and of their brethren, Ethan the son of Kushaiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and with them their brethren of the second order, Zechariah, Ben, Jaaziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattithiah, Elipheleh, Mikneiah, Obededom, and Jeiel, the porters.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, raised their voices with cymbals of brass;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and Zechariah, Aziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Maaseiah, and Benaiah, with psalteries on Alamoth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mattithiah, Elipheleh, Mikneiah, Obededom, Jeiel, and Azaziah, with harps on the Sheminith to excel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Chenaniah, prince of the Levites in prophecy, for he presided in prophecy, because he had understanding.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Berechiah and Elkanah were doorkeepers for the ark.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shebaniah, Jehoshaphat, Nethaneel, Amasai, Zechariah, Benaiah, and Eliezer, the priests, blew the trumpets before the ark of God; and Obededom and Jehiah were also doorkeepers for the ark.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So David and the elders of Israel and the captains over thousands went to bring up the ark of the covenant of the LORD out of the house of Obededom with joy.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And with God helping the Levites that bore the ark of the covenant of the LORD, they sacrificed seven bullocks and seven rams.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David was clothed with a robe of fine linen, and also all the Levites that bore the ark and the singers and Chenaniah, the prince of the prophecy of the singers. David also had upon him an ephod of linen.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Thus all Israel brought up the ark of the covenant of the LORD with shouting and with sound of the shofar and with trumpets and with cymbals, making a noise with psalteries and harps.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And it came to pass, as the ark of the covenant of the LORD came to the city of David, that Michal the daughter of Saul looking out at a window saw King David dancing and playing, and she despised him in her heart.
verses.speaker: Narrator
